statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && branch=$(git head 2>/dev/null || git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git') && echo "$model â€¢ $branch" || echo "$model"
